affect ( "burn_guy", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "KAM10" );
	set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "OFF" );

	task ( "burn_line" )
	{
		set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Script|Full+None+Normal+Stand|Stuck behind glass wall - bangin frantically" );
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/kam8/scientist/01burnt.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM8_001" );
	}

	set ( "SET_LOOK_TYPE", "FULL" );
	dowait ( "burn_line" );
}
